subject: Re: Help on testing EJBs
msgSnippet: Thanks Brian and Jim.  I tried each of your code, and now I am getting the following error.  It looks like it wants to throw a JSAFE_InvalidUseException error,
messageBody:
Thanks Brian and Jim. I tried each of your code, and now I am
getting the following error. It looks like it wants to throw a
JSAFE_InvalidUseException error, which I have never seen before. Any
ideas what would cause this...possible remedies?

Thanks Again!!
Luis
